## EthersARTHStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./arth-ethers.ethersarthconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EthersARTHStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledARTHStore](./arth-ethers.blockpolledarthstore.md) will be created.
